function.name: update_divoom
function.description: Update the Divoom Max to display an emoji.

emoji.description: The emoji to display on the Divoom Max. Use a valid emoji Unicode character.

memory.example: Slam Jackson is Randi's dog. He is a golden doodle.

priority.description: Priority level of the memory, where 0.0 is low priority and 1.0 is high priority.

function.name: memory_delete
function.description: Delete a memory and its tags by memory ID.

memory_id.description: The ID of the memory to delete.

function.name: memory_list
function.description: List all memories along with their keywords.

function.name: memory_search
function.description: Search for memories by a list of keywords (exact, case-insensitive match). Returns memories ordered by number of matches, priority, and recency.

keywords.description: List of keywords to search for.
